import React, { useState } from "react"; import emailjs from "emailjs-com"; import { motion } from "framer-motion"; import logo from "./assets/logo.png"; import successImage from "./assets/success.png"; import qr from "./assets/qr.png"; function App() { const [formData, setFormData] = useState({ name: "", email: "", image: null }); const [submitted, setSubmitted] = useState(false); const handleSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); // 1️⃣ Send confirmation to user emailjs .send( "service_ted5m2h", "template_5qmfosa", { name: formData.name, email: formData.email, }, "D8Cr-U9g1MVqsc5bv" ) .then(() => console.log("Confirmation sent")); // 2️⃣ Alert admin emailjs .send( "service_ted5m2h", "template_nzvxr9o", { name: formData.name, email: formData.email, }, "D8Cr-U9g1MVqsc5bv" ) .then(() => console.log("Alert sent to admin")); setSubmitted(true); }; return (
{/* --- HEADER --- */}

Ghar-ki-Baat

When no one listens, we do.

{/* --- HERO --- */}
Ghar-ki-Baat

When no one listens, we do. A space for real talk. (more than advice , lighter than therapy)

{/* --- WHAT WE DO --- */}

What We Do

• Listen to anything on your mind — stress, carrier confusion, relatiohips, dilemas or just silence.

• Make you feel lighter with calm, honest conversation.

• Give simple guidance or just a space to breathe — no pressure.

{/* --- OUR PLANS --- */}

Our Plans
